title: General Physician in Energy Industry
definition: Treated injuries, common outpatient complaints, and coordinated safe transportation of emergencies on two offshore drilling units with 400 employees. Assisted in implementation of occupational safety standards.

title: Internal Medicine Ward General Physician
definition: Facilitated care of critically ill cancer patients with a team of 2 attending physicians and 10 nurses.

title: Emergency Department General Practitioner
definition: Performed triage and initial assessment of medical and surgical emergencies at 20-bed emergency department public hospital covering a populace of 200,000 Saqqez, Kurdistan

title: Military General Physician (Mandatory Public Service)
definition:
Supervised and implemented disease prevention strategies, early diagnosis & treatment plans for common
presenting diseases in a population of 3000 military personnel/families at an Iranian military ground forces.

title: Family Physician/Primary Health Care Consultant
definition: Monitored health status of a rural population of 10,000 mainly by assisting in family planning, immunization, pediatric care, chronic diseases including diabetes and hypertension
